channel.title: JivanJyoti Foundation - News & Updates
channel.description: Latest news, updates, and insights from JivanJyoti Foundation on environmental conservation, tree plantation, and sustainable development.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2025 JivanJyoti Foundation. All rights reserved.

item.title: Record-Breaking Tree Planting Event!
item.description: Our recent community tree planting event saw over 5,000 saplings planted in a single day, a new record for JivanJyoti Foundation!

item.title: New Conservation Area Established
item.description: We are thrilled to announce the successful establishment of a new protected area, safeguarding critical ecosystems and biodiversity.

item.title: Youth Environmental Summit Highlights
item.description: Inspiring young leaders gathered for our annual summit, sharing innovative ideas for a sustainable future and environmental protection.

item.title: Volunteer Spotlight: Community Heroes
item.description: Learn about our most dedicated volunteers and their incredible contributions to environmental conservation and community development.

item.title: New Research on Forest Carbon Sequestration
item.description: Our latest scientific findings highlight the crucial role of healthy forests in absorbing atmospheric carbon and fighting climate change.
